title: Pork fillet in cinnamon and soy sauce
ingredients: ['500g pork fillet, cut into 5cm (2 in) medallions', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 to 2 teaspoons olive oil', 'small red onion, sliced in half moon', '1-2 chillies, diced with seeds', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (3cm) piece fresh root ginger, grated', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '400ml chicken stock']
